channel.title: Departed's Legacy (Old source) Repost
channel.description:
[center][b][i][u]THIS SOURCE IS OVER 2 YEARS OLD![/u][/i][/b][/center]
Hello, this is Aeolian, also know as Mod Jeffreh or Departed. [IMG]http://img261.imageshack.us/img261/8311/00sw3.png[/img]
Some of you might have known but I had a source with about 40,000 characters on it. I programmed it for a week and then put it up and it was an instant success. I never advertised it besides on the moparscape server status page. I worked a lot on it but I didn't put as much effort as I wanted to in. This server is very unique and it has quite a lot of features on it that you may find abnormal. It has about 10 total mini-games. All of them are based off my ideas with exception to god wars.
Since this is old and outdated and I already posted before I thought I would re-post. There is no point in me keeping it to myself I haven't worked on this for about a year and I am currently working on a new server anyways with 0 custom items. It will be a replication of 317 RS.
Basic Features:
[ul][li]Implemented very basic combat system, (Ranged, melee and magic.) Has a bit of recolors, but they all have purposes so it doesn't just flood the server with recolored crap. Implemented auto save that works very well Added auto-skillcape trimming, if you have 2 99 skills and you buy a skillcape it automatically trims.[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
Now some more features and skills:
Smithing: [IMG]http://img111.imageshack.us/img111/4756/ds2lh6.png[/img] [IMG]http://img147.imageshack.us/img147/3535/ds3em9.png[/img] [IMG]http://img117.imageshack.us/img117/4605/ds4qi0.png[/img]
Baisc Mining: [IMG]http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/3573/ds5rz5.png[/img]
Fletching: [IMG]http://img147.imageshack.us/img147/994/ds6xd1.png[/img]
VERY BASIC Firemaking: [IMG]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/7074/ds7ya7.png[/img]
Woodcutting: [IMG]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/7208/ds8xb6.png[/img]
Basic Gem cutting for crafting: [IMG]http://img127.imageshack.us/img127/9580/ds9jk7.png[/img]
Slayer with missions for experience: [IMG]http://img243.imageshack.us/img243/245/ds11kn3.png[/img]
Fishing: [IMG]http://img518.imageshack.us/img518/800/ds10kx0.png[/img]
Cooking: [IMG]http://img115.imageshack.us/img115/9418/ds12xh8.png[/img]
Very basic Runecrafting: [IMG]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/1046/ds14xo1.png[/img]
Very BasicTheiving: [IMG]http://img82.imageshack.us/img82/2105/ds13bi3.png[/img]
Basic Herblore (Meant for making pots for pking.): [IMG]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/6047/ds15wb8.png[/img]
Beginner areas and starter: [IMG]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/9582/ds18gk9.png[/img]
Cooks screw up quest (Lamb Chops): [IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/2913/d19qv5.png[/img]
Those are the only pictures I am going to upload for you.
Here are a few things.
[ul][li][center] There is a barrows mini-game (Its SUPER HARD, but if you want to edit it you can.) There are no glitches in the mini-games... I already fixed them all. There is Godwars, it's not pvp. There is pking but it's not very good. Vengeance is basic. There is a dragon full helm mini-game. There is Departed's General Mini-game There is Departed's Queen Mini-game (You can get 3 secret weapons, never before seen.) Starting Level is 2, you have 5 hp when you log in. The xp rates are pretty high. (Test reasons) Has specials, even godsword specials, but not proper graphics A lot of improvements on player GUI have been made [/center][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
Basically, this source is very scattered and there is a lot of unfinished things in it that were going to be made into something amazing.
Do NOT flame me telling me I am a noob or that I don't know what I'm doing. Yes this source is big, the size of it is quite big for whats in it, but it is stable none the less. I wasn't trying to impress anyone with this post, I was simply sharing what I call an "epic fail," to the community. I call it an epic fail because I don't think I did a good job on it. This was my first source, I've had many afterwords but I'm not releasing those.
All in all though its a REALLY fun source to play on and it attracts a lot of players. If you stick with it, clean it up a bit and program it. You will have yourself an amazing source.
ITS ALL OPEN SOURCE!
Source/Client download: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=FWOMIYHE
Credits: WinterLove 10% Bulby Strife (Synthetic base.) 20% Jukk (Some skills) 10% Rich' 5% Blake 15% Makers of Models 5% Zoltanman 5% (Ripped some combat and skill code) K a h Leader/Departed 30%
ENJOY
NOTE: This is not Deltascape, Project Czar, ZDR, Richscape or any other source that has been leached to the ground.
